attributes.description:
With its reputation for reliability, the Nissan NP300 dominates tough terrain. Renowned for its excellent capabilities, this pick-up is ready for any challenge that comes its way. Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.description:
2016 VW GOLF 7 DSG 1.4 TSI ENGINE VERY CLEAN NICE SEAT Mileage: 92000 km. Color: White Price: R199, 995 Neg


BLACKLISTED ARE ALSO WELCOME TO APPLY FOR FINANCE


Features: AUTOMATIC, LEATHER NICE SEAT INTERIOR As Good As New Car, 3x3 Point Rear Seat Belts, Driver airbag and Passenger airbag, Adjustable Seats, With Spare Tire, Wheel, 18’’ inch Meg’s, Smash & grab, Anti theft system, ABS, Airbags, Air condition, 5 doors, Spotless, Nice In Color Low Mileage On Clock, Central Locking, and Gear Locking, New Tires, Alloy Wheel's, Spotlights In Front, Alarm and Mobilize Power Steering, and Adjustable steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Aircon, Factory fitted Louder Mp3 Radio, Car Very Clean Inside And Outside, with Average Fuel of 7.1 liter per 100km. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. 


Definitely A Must See, Please Call/WhatsApp DE REV AUTOS to View All Vehicle,

1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometer vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 
2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check 
3. Over 1,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 
4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition.
 
Going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or tests drive the vehicle, we are situated at 658 LOUIS BOTHA AVEUNE WYNBERG SANDTON JOHANNESBURG 2090. Operating hours are from 08:00 till 17:00 Mon - Fri and 08:00 till 14:00 Sat. ALTERNATIVE CONTACT: CALL 011 485 1186 OR WHATS APP 0784890344, 0810023905

attributes.description:
Lindsay Saker has always been a part of your neighbourhood and a part of your life. We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network. When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car. After Sales Service and support is the next stage in your journey. We are a committed dealer with world-class experts to ensure that you and your Volkswagen are always taken care of. We at Lindsay Saker Vereeniging is your dealer. 

We accept Trade We offer finance, all banks. All vehicles come with a Road worthy certificate, 80-Point check, Quality Valet
Price excludes any documentation fees and on road costs. . .
